ygData.msgSnippet: Quickstrike: Hearing Mantella s voice in the room, as he was crouched by a backless chair that was by a round table, banged his head on the bottom seat of it.

Quickstrike:




Hearing Mantella's voice in the room, as he was crouched by a backless chair 
that was by a round table, banged his head on the bottom seat of it. He 
cried out in pain for a second and placed a multi-digited hand on top of his 
head. He slowly stood up, collecting up a disk from the floor. He placed it 
on the table near-by.

Still holding his head, he said to her, "That was quick." He grabbed up 
three disks that was on the table and placed them under his armor behind his 
back.
